name: Reflections of Life: Tree of Dreams Collector's Edition
description: For 25 years, you thought you had no family. But one night, a man steps through a mirror from another world, claiming to be your uncle... changing your life forever.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 1539 MB available space
